root.name: Moop and Dreadly in the Treasure on Bing Bong Island
root.description: Story Captain Dreadly has found a real treasure map, and so he and his friend Moop go on an adventure. Along the way, they will aid villagers, explore ancient ruins, and outwit a gang of pirates in the hopes to find the treasure of Bing Bong Island.GameplayMoop Dreadly is a standard point click adventure game divided into an episodic format, with 6 chapters total. Adventure awaits! Chapter 1: "What Could Be Better?"Chapter 2: "Two Rocks, Gotcha!"Chapter 3: "The Treasure's Awaitin'!"Chapter 4: "Smooth Move, Mister."Chapter 5: "Aye Aye, Cap'n Trench!"Chapter 6: "Real Treasure?"

similar_games.game: Pajama Sam: No Need to Hide When It’s Dark Outside
